channel.title: Editing & Map Playtesting
channel.description: Want feedback on your map, or some help with the editor?

item.title: CTF-DevilsLair
item.author: invalid@example.com (ValleyFly)
item.dc:creator: ValleyFly
item.content:encoded:
Got another map for you guys to check out for me so break out your whips
I think I've got a better handle on the editor and lots of time reading tutorials. This will be my 1st CTF map, 2nd map for UT2k3.
Read the Readme 1st BEFORE you play this map. Then judge it! Looking foward to your feedback... good and/ or bad


CTF-DevilsLair_beta002
http://www.unrealplayground.com/download.php?mapid=3780

item.content:encoded:
Alright so this is the outstanding result of 200 hours of work and my 11th map. Let me know what you all think. A true mapper thrives on feedback.

This sentence is totally 100% un-needed, but the download link is below along with the oh so appealing screenshots.
Here. I'll even Show you where...

Download Link To FileFront:
http://www.filefront.com/16293995/DM-Arachi-Final.zip

INSTALLATION:
unzip to find these...

DM-Arachi-Final Feedback??

item.title: CTF layout in need of feedback.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rask)
item.dc:creator: Rask
item.content:encoded:
UT3 CTF layout in need of feedback.

Hello fellow mappers, I'm looking for some layout/gameplay gurus, to check out my CTF layout. The map has no name yet, eventually when I can think of something...

A symmetrical, three routed CTF layout. A few larger rooms and fluid transitions between areas (mostly, need to work on that a bit more). A large center hall (as CTF usually has) where all routes end up and players can catch the enemy FC with snipering.

This layout only has two flags,...

CTF layout in need of feedback.

item.title: CTF-LastHope testing/tweaking time!
item.author: invalid@example.com (spec_x)
item.dc:creator: spec_x
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, haven't posted anything here in a while so I figured I'd do it now. This is a little map I dinked around with for a couple weeks. I had like one person beta test it as I was in a hurry to get it done for a project so I've decided to post it here for you all. It might actually be the first map I want reviewed so I want to make sure it doesn't completely suck. It's posted at nalicity at the moment because my server is down so I'll post that link and some screenshots. Thanks guys!...

CTF-LastHope testing/tweaking time!

item.title: DM-Epitow[UT99]
item.author: invalid@example.com (milb)
item.dc:creator: milb
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm new at insite, but who cares!

Hm, here you can find two Pics and a prepreprealpha of my newest try to make a map.
Think i'll get some coments about the looking, coz it looks like DM-1on1-Roughenery, but I wanted it look so.
P.S. You can play the map only in LMS (3 Players should be enough), coz there no weapons!

item.title: DM-1on1-Derelict UT2004 beta (Back at it again :))
item.author: invalid@example.com (barballs)
item.dc:creator: barballs
item.content:encoded:
Hey Folks! Its been a long time since my first map. So I've decided to release the next WIP: DM-1on1-Derelict. It is based on a Quake 3 CPMA map that I believe is called "Pull your socks up".

The level has been populated with weapons, pickups and a crude bot network to facilitate testing. I would appreciate any feedback at all.

Thank you for your time and I hope you enjoy testing it as much as I am making it!...

DM-1on1-Derelict UT2004 beta (Back at it again

item.title: A Mas/Barballs combo...
item.author: invalid@example.com (barballs)
item.dc:creator: barballs
item.content:encoded:
Whats that you ask?

Mas came to me with a map design AGES ago. Between work and other projects I couldn't get this properly started... untill now!

This screenshot below is just a teaser for what is going to come forth very soon!!

I aslo pose a question to you all. Shall it be a large DM map or a 1on1? Your comments are VITAL for the progression of this map. So which ever you would rather see just let me know here. Thank you.

item.title: DynamicProjector let SM disappear
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chavez1)
item.dc:creator: Chavez1
item.content:encoded:
I built a hanging light using karma to move(shoot) it, with a dynamic projector. All worked well.
Than I noticed, that static meshes, which were initially in the FOV of the projector disappearing when the projector FOV does not touch them while moving arround.

Tried to change the different Framebuffering blends, ClipSM > nothing
Only Acceptprojectors false in the SM properties helped of course (but hope there is a better solution, would like to have the proj on them ,too)

If there is...

DynamicProjector let SM disappear

this map is at version 1.2

this is the upgrade !

==================================================

UPGRADE VER 1.2

* light up to the electrical turrets

* sphere position in the electrical cable

* more cover at the node by the electrial buildings

* limit z-fly for don't crash up to the map

* limit field map by a write "allert leave the field" & for more hard flyers the dead

* for the leviathan up to the bridge autodirectional respawn for more easy drive

* for...

ONS-BigDam Ver. 1.2

item.title: Map Beta Testers wanted - CTF_Equilibrium-Beta1
item.author: invalid@example.com (The_Head)
item.dc:creator: The_Head
item.content:encoded:
Heres a map I have been working on for quite a while. Its A CTF level sat spinning in space. I would like people to beta test this map and help iron out bugs for me, i would be very gratefull for any help.

BTW anybody who has played a map named CTF-EquilibriumRedesigned on the CTF www.kokrull.com server will recognise this map. this is basicly the same map.

This map be being played on www.kokrull.com server during weekdays. please join games and leave advice and...

Map Beta Testers wanted - CTF_Equilibrium-Beta1

item.title: New UT Mapping Competition
item.author: invalid@example.com (Thunderstrike)
item.dc:creator: Thunderstrike
item.content:encoded:
For anyone still interested in original UT level design, I'm currently running a level design competition through the Unreal Playground forums.

Check the thread for fulls details:

http://forums.unrealplayground.com/showthread.php?t=24181
